name: Simnova - Developers Home
body:
This site is the home of Simnova's Open Source work, feel free to criticize / contribute.

### Highlights - Projects
* [SharpSauce](https://github.com/simnova/SharpSauce)
* [OmnitureHelper] (http://developers.simnova.com/OmnitureHelper/)

### Highlights - Documentation

* [Using Backbone.js with IIS](https://github.com/simnova/webdevdocs/wiki/.NET-backbone.js-setup-procedure)
* [.NET performance optimization settings](https://github.com/simnova/webdevdocs/wiki/.NET-performance-optimization-settings)
* [Other Dev Notes](https://github.com/simnova/webdevdocs/wiki/_pages)


### Support or Contact
Patrick Gidich (@simnova) 1-800-SIMNOVA
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
